meaningMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
readingMnemonic: The reading is like the reading of 包み, which means "bundle" or "package." Try to think of an <vocabulary>embankment</vocabulary> that's made purely from bundles and packages. These <reading>包み</reading>(つつみ) are the only thing holding the water in!
